channel.description: Recent content in dream on stuart nelson

item.title: Had a Dream
item.description: I’m going to try something new. I tend to have fairly vivid dreams. They also can be pretty crazy. So I’m going to attempt to write them down and maybe throw out a little analysis. Some of them are pretty clear; some are not. My goal is two-fold: Remember some of these dreams and what my subconscious was going through at the time Be able to come back to perhaps come up with a better interpretation.
